uvi.description:
wq: handle VM suspension in stall detection

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.195 by commit 50316635e644a0b9e62d3263fb4e8be2104605b6. For more details please see the references link.
